title: Timeless Polki Haaram: A Regal Statement Piece
materials: Rose-Cut Diamonds. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous sheen.
features: This exquisite haaram showcases a graduated design of floral and geometric motifs, each meticulously handcrafted. The central pendant features a large, impressive Polki diamond set in a double halo of smaller Polki diamonds, adding depth and brilliance. The setting emphasizes the natural beauty and unique character of each uncut diamond.
colors: Predominantly gold with shimmering white and clear Polki diamonds. The warmth of the gold enhances the natural fire of the diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaaham)
and other significant celebrations (Subhakaryam). Also suitable for making a sophisticated statement at upscale social events.
description: This Polki haaram is a timeless investment piece that embodies the rich heritage of Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The use of uncut Polki diamonds gives it a unique and antique feel, while the high-quality gold ensures lasting durability and value. Its regal design and undeniable sparkle will make you the center of attention at any event. The traditional 'kundan' setting, meticulously done by artisans from Hyderabad, adds to its value and cultural significance.
